parameters.description: Required. The name of the test case resource to retrieve. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testCases/{test_case_id}`

parameters.description: Required. The parent resource from which to list test cases. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}`
parameters.name: parent

parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of test cases to return. The service may return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 50 test cases will be returned. The maximum value is 1000; values above 1000 will be coerced to 1000.
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: Optional. A page token, received from a previous `ListTestCases` call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page. When paginating, all other parameters provided to `ListTestCases` must match the call that provided the page token.
parameters.name: pageToken

parameters.description: Required. The parent resource where this test case will be created. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}`
parameters.name: parent

parameters.description: Optional. The ID to use for the test case, which will become the final component of the test case's resource name. This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters are /a-z-/.
parameters.name: testCaseId

parameters.description: Required. The parent resource where these test cases will be deleted. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}`
parameters.name: parent

parameters.description: Required. The name of the release resource, which is the parent of the tests Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`
parameters.name: parent

parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of tests to return. The service may return fewer than this value.
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: Optional. A page token, received from a previous `ListReleaseTests` call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.
parameters.name: pageToken

parameters.description: Optional. The requested view on the returned ReleaseTests. Defaults to the basic view.
parameters.name: view

get.description: List results for automated tests run on release.

parameters.description: Required. The name of the release resource, which is the parent of the test Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`
parameters.name: parent

parameters.description: Optional. The ID to use for the test, which will become the final component of the test's resource name. This value should be 4-63 characters, and valid characters are /a-z-/. If it is not provided one will be automatically generated.
parameters.name: releaseTestId

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
fields.name: fields

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.
key.name: key

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.
oauth_token.name: oauth_token

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.
prettyPrint.name: prettyPrint

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.
quotaUser.name: quotaUser

AndroidxCrawlerOutputPoint.description: Point for describing bounding boxes tap locations Top left is 0,0

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1Release.description: A release of a Firebase app.

binaryDownloadUri.description: Output only. A signed link (which expires in one hour) to directly download the app binary (IPA/APK/AAB) file.

buildVersion.description: Output only. Build version of the release. For an Android release, the build version is the `versionCode`. For an iOS release, the build version is the `CFBundleVersion`.

createTime.description: Output only. The time the release was created.

displayVersion.description: Output only. Display version of the release. For an Android release, the display version is the `versionName`. For an iOS release, the display version is the `CFBundleShortVersionString`.

firebaseConsoleUri.description: Output only. A link to the Firebase console displaying a single release.

name.description: The name of the release resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}`

testingUri.description: Output only. A link to the release in the tester web clip or Android app that lets testers (which were granted access to the app) view release notes and install the app onto their devices.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1ReleaseNotes.description: Notes that belong to a release.

text.description: The text of the release notes.

release.description: Release associated with the uploaded binary.

certificateHashMd5.description: MD5 hash of the certificate used to resign the AAB

certificateHashSha1.description: SHA1 hash of the certificate used to resign the AAB

certificateHashSha256.description: SHA256 hash of the certificate used to resign the AAB

steps.description: Required. Steps to be accomplished by the AI

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaAiStep.description: A step to be accomplished by the AI

assertion.description: An assertion to be checked by the AI

goal.description: A goal to be accomplished by the AI

hint.description: Optional. Hint text containing suggestions to help the agent accomplish the goal

successCriteria.description: Optional. A description of criteria the agent should use to determine if the goal has been successfully completed

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaAiStepResu.description: Captures the results of an AiStep

assertionDetails.description: Output only. Details for an assertion step.

goalDetails.description: Output only. Details for a goal step.

state.description: Output only. The current state of the step

step.description: Required. The step performed by the AI

aabCertificate.description: App bundle test certificate generated for the app.

aabState.description: App bundle state. Only valid for android apps. The app_view field in the request must be set to FULL in order for this to be populated.

contactEmail.description: Developer contact email for testers to reach out to about privacy or support issues.

projectNumber.description: Project number of the Firebase project, for example 300830567303.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaAppCrash.description: An app crash that occurred during an automated test.

message.description: Output only. The message associated with the crash.

stackTrace.description: Output only. The raw stack trace.

explanation.description: Output only. An explanation justifying the assertion result.

result.description: Output only. The result of the assertion.

screenshot.description: Output only. The screenshot used in the context of this assertion.

names.description: Required. The name of the test cases to delete. A maximum number of 1000 test cases can be deleted in one batch Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testCases/{test_case_id}`

releaseNotes.description: The actual release notes body from the user

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaDeviceActi.description: A high level action taken by the AI on the device, potentially involving multiple taps, text entries, waits, etc.

description.description: Output only. A short description of the high level action taken by the AI agent.

deviceInteractions.description: Output only. The interactions made with the device as part of this higher level action taken by the agent, such as taps, text entries, waits, etc.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaDeviceExec.description: The results of running an automated test on a particular device.

aiStepResults.description: Output only. Results of the AI steps if passed in

appCrash.description: Output only. An app crash, if any occurred during the test.

crawlGraphUri.description: Output only. A URI to an image of the Robo crawl graph.

device.description: Required. The device that the test was run on.

failedReason.description: Output only. The reason why the test failed.

inconclusiveReason.description: Output only. The reason why the test was inconclusive.

resultsStoragePath.description: Output only. The path to a directory in Cloud Storage that will eventually contain the results for this execution. For example, gs://bucket/Nexus5-18-en-portrait.

roboStats.description: Output only. The statistics collected during the Robo test.

screenshotUris.description: Output only. A list of screenshot image URIs taken from the Robo crawl. The file names are numbered by the order in which they were taken.

state.description: Output only. The state of the test.

videoUri.description: Output only. A URI to a video of the test run.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaDeviceInte.description: An interaction with the device, such as a tap, text entry, wait, etc.

keyCode.description: Output only. Key code for a key event action.

screenshot.description: Output only. The screenshot used in the context of this action. The screen may have changed before the action was actually taken.

textInput.description: Output only. Text entered for a text entry action.

end.description: Output only. The end point of the swipe.

start.description: Output only. The start point of the swipe.

duration.description: Output only. The duration of the wait.

buildVersion.description: Optional. Ignored. Used to be build version of the app release if an instance identifier was provided for the release_id.

displayVersion.description: Optional. Ignored. Used to be display version of the app release if an instance identifier was provided for the release_id.

emails.description: Optional. An email address which should get access to this release, for example rebeccahe@google.com

groupIds.description: Optional. A repeated list of group aliases to enable access to a release for Note: This field is misnamed, but can't be changed because we need to maintain compatibility with old build tools

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaGetRelease.description: Response object to get the release given a upload hash

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaGetTesterU.description: Response containing the UDIDs of tester iOS devices in a project

testerUdids.description: The UDIDs of tester iOS devices in a project

errorCode.description: The error code associated with (only set on "FAILURE")

message.description: Any additional context for the given upload status (e.g. error message) Meant to be displayed to the client

release.description: The release that was created from the upload (only set on "SUCCESS")

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaGoalAction.description: An action taken by the AI agent while attempting to accomplish a goal.

debugInfo.description: Output only. Debug information explaining why the agent to the specific action

deviceAction.description: Output only. A high level action taken by the AI on the device.

explanation.description: Output only. An explanation justifying why the action was taken.

terminalAction.description: Output only. An action taken by the AI to end the goal.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaGoalAction.description: Information to help the customer understand why the agent took this action

annotatedScreenshotUri.description: Output only. URI of the screenshot with elements labeled which was used by the agent

jsonUri.description: Output only. Structured data explaining the agent's choice

goalActions.description: Output only. The actions taken by the AI while attempting to accomplish the goal.

token.description: The JWT token (three Base64URL-encoded strings joined by dots).

nextPageToken.description: A short-lived token, which can be sent as `pageToken` to retrieve the next page. If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.
A token, which can be sent as `page_token` to retrieve the next page. If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

testCases.description: The test cases from the specified app.

fieldHints.description: Optional. Hints to the crawler for identifying input fields

google.description: Optional. Are these credentials for Google?

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaLoginCrede.description: Hints to the crawler for identifying input fields

passwordResourceName.description: Required. The Android resource name of the password UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

usernameResourceName.description: Required. The Android resource name of the username UI element. For example, in Java: R.string.foo in xml: @string/foo Only the "foo" part is needed. Reference doc: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/resources/accessing-resources.html

distributedAt.description: Timestamp when the release was created

openInvitationCount.description: Number of testers who have open invitations for the release

testerCount.description: Count of testers added to the release

testerWithInstallCount.description: Number of testers who have installed the release

releaseNotes.description: The actual release notes text from the user.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaReleaseTes.description: The results of running an automated test on a release.

aiInstructions.description: Optional. Instructions for AI driven test.

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the test was run.

deviceExecutions.description: Required. The results of the test on each device.

displayName.description: Optional. Display name of the release test. Required if the release test is created with multiple goals.

loginCredential.description: Optional. Input only. Login credentials for the test. Input only.

name.description: The name of the release test resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/releases/{release_id}/tests/{test_id}`

testCase.description: Optional. The test case that was used to generate this release test. Note: The test case may have changed or been deleted since the release test was created. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app}/testCases/{test_case}`

testState.description: Output only. The state of the release test.

aiInstructions.description: Optional. Instructions for AI driven test

loginCredential.description: Optional. Login credential for automated tests

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaRoboStats.description: Statistics collected during a Robo test.

actionsPerformed.description: Output only. Number of actions that crawler performed.

distinctVisitedScreens.description: Output only. Number of distinct screens visited.

mainActivityCrawlTimedOut.description: Output only. Whether the main activity crawl timed out.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaScreenshot.description: A device screenshot taken during a test.

height.description: Output only. The height of the screenshot, in pixels.

uri.description: Output only. The URI of the screenshot.

width.description: Output only. The width of the screenshot, in pixels.

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTerminalAc.description: An action taken by the AI to end the goal.

reason.description: Output only. The reason why this goal was ended.

screenshot.description: Output only. The screenshot used in the context of this terminal action.

aiInstructions.description: Optional. Instructions for AI driven test.

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the test case was created

displayName.description: Required. Display name of the test case.

name.description: Identifier. The name of the test case resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testCases/{test_case_id}`

displayName.description: Optional. Display name of the AI driven test. Required if the release test is created with multiple goals.

name.description: Identifier. The name of the test configuration resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/apps/{app_id}/testConfig`

testDevices.description: Optional. Tests will be run on this list of devices

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTestDevice.description: A device on which automated tests can be run.

locale.description: Optional. The locale of the device (e.g. "en_US" for US English) during the test.

orientation.description: Optional. The orientation of the device during the test.

version.description: Required. The version of the device (API level on Android).

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTestQuota.description: Customer quota information for `ReleaseTests`. Note: This quota only applies to tests with `AiInstructions` and is separate from the quota which might apply to the device time used by any tests.

limit.description: Output only. Maximum number of `ReleaseTests` allotted for the current month.

name.description: Identifier. The name of the `TestQuota` resource. Format: `projects/{project_number}/testQuota`

usage.description: Output only. Number of `ReleaseTests` run in the current month

GoogleFirebaseAppdistroV1alphaTesterUdid.description: The UDIDs of a tester's iOS device

name.description: The name of the tester's device

platform.description: The platform of the tester's device

udid.description: The UDID of the tester's device

GoogleProtobufEmpty.description: A generic empty message that you can re-use to avoid defining duplicated empty messages in your APIs. A typical example is to use it as the request or the response type of an API method. For instance: service Foo { rpc Bar(google.protobuf.Empty) returns (google.protobuf.Empty); }

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-pl: See, edit, configure, and delete your Google Cloud data and see the email address for your Google Account.
See, edit, configure, and delete your Google Cloud data and see the email address for your Google Account.
